verbs.description: [ARG1: U.S. trade relations] [V: appear] [C-ARG1: to be hitting rock bottom , ahead of potential new tariffs on China Friday and continuing worries that President Donald Trump will shred the NAFTA trade agreement with Canada and Mexico] .
